name: bellman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person working in a hotel whose job is to carry bags, open doors, etc. for guests: A conversation with a hotel bellman led us to discover a great local restaurant. They tip the valets and bellmen generously. Synonyms
bellboy
bellhop
More examplesFewer examplesHe loved to chat to the bellman or the doorman wherever he was staying.He traveled through Europe, earning a living by working as a desk clerk and bellman.The hotel has over 1,000 employees who work as housekeepers, front desk clerks, bellmen, cooks and dishwashers. She asked the bellman to hail her a cab.
